title: unfair leavebuster (riot help me here)
body: so I was gonna play dominion with a friend but my league client wouldn't let me play so when I closed league to open it again apparently it needed an update and that was why I couldn't connect, so now I have 10 minute leavebuster's for 5 games riot WTH!

replies.body:
You'll never get a 5-game low-priority queue for a single instance of disconnecting from a match or champ select. It in fact, takes a trend of disconnections before you receive such a penalty.

If you've been experiencing specific issues causing disconnections, please let me know so we can work together towards resolving them.
I have gotten leave busters in the past and that may be what caused it to go hit me like this but I did get kicked to update my client and when I came back in I got the leavebuster
Gotcha. If you experience any other issues getting kicked or causing disconnections, please let me know.
btw I still have it but only for 2 more games god leavebuster might as well be called failbuster
